name: Grey Sun
description:
Me and my buds at FallingStar are working on a roguelike RPG where scenes play in a random order. I made this in a few hours to show some proofs of concept for what that might look like. Lines were written to be easy to instill meaning into based on the context of other lines. Different methods of randomizing which lines show are selectable, so you can see for yourself which ones you like. (Leave feedback in the comments!)

--MAKE SURE TO INSTALL THE RTP FIRST!!--

Go on here and click "RPG Maker VX Ace" https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/run-time-package this is necessary for the game to run.
